SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_items_info (subject, code, bar_code, classify_name, classify_id, trade_type, purchase_price, wholesale_price, retail_price, introduction, image_1, image_2, image_3, image_4, image_5, conver_id, unit_id, unit_name, sub_item_property, store_rule, item_batch, combination_info, company_id, item_type ) values (#{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{tradeType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{wholesalePrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{retailPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{converId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subItemProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeRule,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{itemBatch,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{combinationInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemType,jdbcType=SMALLINT} )
mapper.update: update t_items_info set subject = #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bar_code = #{barCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify_name = #{classifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, classify_id = #{classifyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, trade_type = #{tradeType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=REAL}, wholesale_price = #{wholesalePrice,jdbcType=REAL}, retail_price = #{retailPrice,jdbcType=REAL}, introduction = #{introduction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_1 = #{image1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_2 = #{image2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_3 = #{image3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_4 = #{image4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_5 = #{image5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, conver_id = #{converId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, unit_id = #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sub_item_property = #{subItemProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, store_rule = #{storeRule,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, item_batch = #{itemBatch,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, combination_info = #{combinationInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, item_type = #{itemType,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select item_id, subject, code, bar_code, classify_name, classify_id, trade_type, purchase_price, wholesale_price, retail_price, introduction, image_1, image_2, image_3, image_4, image_5, conver_id, unit_id, unit_name, sub_item_property, store_rule, item_batch, combination_info, company_id, item_type from t_items_info where item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select item_id, subject, code, bar_code, classify_name, classify_id, trade_type, purchase_price, wholesale_price, retail_price, introduction, image_1, image_2, image_3, image_4, image_5, conver_id, unit_id, unit_name, sub_item_property, store_rule, item_batch, combination_info, company_id, item_type from t_items_info

SELECT item_id, subject, code, bar_code, classify_name, classify_id, trade_type, purchase_price, wholesale_price, retail_price, introduction, image_1, image_2, image_3, image_4, image_5, conver_id, unit_id, unit_name, sub_item_property, store_rule, item_batch, combination_info, company_id, item_type FOR t_items_info WHERE code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
